channel.title: Attacking with melle from far away
channel.description: If someone if frozen on my server and A player is more than 1 square away they can still attack you with melee. Any fixes. Thanks. EDIT: Really could use a fix everyone, thanks!

@runescapepkserver wrote:

If someone if frozen on my server and A player is more than 1 square away they can still attack you with melee. Any fixes. Thanks.
